title: Did a Pilot Use an Axe to Reenter the Cockpit?
subtitle: Rumor has it that a commercial airline pilot who accidentally locked himself out of the cockpit had to hack down the door with a fire axe to regain entry.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: A commercial airline pilot who accidentally locked himself out of the cockpit had to hack down the door with a fire axe to regain entry.
